languages.text: Занимая пост Высокого фактотума, я инициировал эту инспекцию, а потому, исполнил свой долг и последовал за Лорд-капитаном. Подойдя ближе, мы заметили удивительную странность — обычно недвижимые зрачки сервиторов суетливо дрожали. Под медными ошейниками с начертанными на них преступлениями, что совершили в прошлом эти люди, вздувались и пульсировали вены. Казалось, что эти лишенные разума полумашины находились в чрезвычайном напряжении.

traits.locale_text: Занимая пост Высокого Фактотума, я инициировал эту инспекцию, а потому, исполнил свой долг и последовал за Лорд-капитаном. Подойдя ближе, мы заметили удивительную странность — обычно недвижимые зрачки сервиторов суетливо дрожали. Под медными ошейниками с начертанными на них преступлениями, что совершили в прошлом эти люди, вздувались и пульсировали вены. Казалось, что эти лишенные разума полумашины находились в чрезвычайном напряжении.

languages.text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

Подойдя ближе, мы заметили удивительную странность — обычно недвижимые зрачки сервиторов суетливо дрожали. Под медными ошейниками с начертанными на них преступлениями, что совершили в прошлом эти люди, вздувались и пульсировали вены. Казалось, что эти лишенные разума полумашины находились в чрезвычайном напряжении.

As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars with their past offences inscribed upon them. It was like those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

languages.text: 私はハイ・ファクトタムであるため、その検査全体を促したのは私であり、したがって、ロード・キャプテンに従うのが私の義務だった。もっと近づいていくと、魅力的な規則性に気付いた。通常は静止しているはずのサーヴィターの瞳孔が、激しく揺れていた。その膨らんだ血管は、かつての過ちが刻まれた銅の襟の下で脈打っていた。それは、心ないの半機械が極度の緊張状態に永遠に閉じ込められているかのようだった。
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: 私はハイ・ファクトタムであるため、その検査全体を促したのは私であり、したがって、ロード・キャプテンに従うのが私の義務だった。もっと近づいていくと、魅力的な規則性に気付いた。通常は静止しているはずのサーヴィターの瞳孔が、激しく揺れていた。その膨らんだ血管は、かつての過ちが刻まれた銅の襟の下で脈打っていた。それは、心ないの半機械が極度の緊張状態に永遠に閉じ込められているかのようだった。

languages.text: En tant que haut factotum, c'était moi qui avais décidé de mener cette inspection, aussi était-il de mon devoir de suivre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. En nous approchant, nous remarquâmes une irrégularité pour le moins fascinante : les pupilles des servitors, d'ordinaire fixes, s'agitaient dans tous les sens. Leurs veines gonflées palpitaient sous les colliers de cuivre qui renseignaient sur leurs crimes passés. On aurait dit que ces semi-machines sans conscience étaient en proie à un état perpétuel de tension extrême.
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: En tant que haut factotum, c'était moi qui avais décidé de mener cette inspection, aussi était-il de mon devoir de suivre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. En nous approchant, nous remarquâmes une irrégularité pour le moins fascinante : les pupilles des servitors, d'ordinaire fixes, s'agitaient dans tous les sens. Leurs veines gonflées palpitaient sous les colliers de cuivre qui renseignaient sur leurs crimes passés. On aurait dit que ces semi-machines sans conscience étaient en proie à un état perpétuel de tension extrême.

languages.text: 身为高阶顾问，是我请求舰长大人前来检查这些机仆的，因此我也有责任始终跟在舰长大人身边。当我们靠近时，我们发现了令人疑惑的异常现象。那些机仆的瞳孔通常都是静止的，但现在却在疯狂地抖动。他们脖子上戴着刻有罪行的铜制项圈，项圈下面隆起的血管却在跳动，就好像这些没有思想的半机械人始终处于紧张状态一样。
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: 身为高阶顾问，是我请求舰长大人前来检查这些奴工的，因此我也有责任始终跟在舰长大人身边。当我们靠近时，我们发现了令人疑惑的异常现象。那些奴工的瞳孔通常都是静止的，但现在却在疯狂地抖动。他们脖子上戴着刻有罪行的铜制项圈，项圈下面隆起的血管却在跳动，就好像这些没有思想的半机械人始终处于紧张状态一样。

languages.text: Como Sumo Factótum, la inspección comenzó por orden mía, y, por tanto, era mi deber seguir a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Según nos acercamos, reparamos en una irregularidad fascinante: las pupilas de los servidores, que deberían permanecer estáticas, se movían frenéticamente. Sus venas protuberantes palpitaban bajo los collares de cobre en los que estaban inscritos sus delitos. Es como si estos híbridos entre hombre y máquina estuvieran en un estado constante de tensión extrema.
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: Como Sumo Factótum, la inspección comenzó por orden mía, y, por tanto, era mi deber seguir a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Según nos acercamos, reparamos en una irregularidad fascinante: las pupilas de los servidores, que deberían permanecer estáticas, se movían frenéticamente. Sus venas protuberantes palpitaban bajo los collares de cobre en los que estaban inscritos sus delitos. Es como si estos híbridos entre hombre y máquina estuvieran en un estado constante de tensión extrema.

languages.text: Als Hoch-Faktotum hatte ich die gesamte Inspektion ausgelöst, daher war es meine Pflicht, dem Lord Captain zu folgen. Als wir näher kamen, bemerkten wir eine faszinierende Unregelmäßigkeit — die Pupillen der Servitoren, die normalerweise reglos waren, zitterten nun wild. Ihre angeschwollenen Venen pulsierten unter den Kupferhalsbändern, in die ihre Vergehen eingraviert waren. Es war fast, als wären diese hirnlosen Halbmaschinen in einem ewigen Zustand der extremen Anspannung gefangen.
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: Als Hoch-Faktotum hatte ich die gesamte Inspektion ausgelöst, daher war es meine Pflicht, dem Lord Captain zu folgen. Als wir näher kamen, bemerkten wir eine faszinierende Unregelmäßigkeit — die Pupillen der Servitoren, die normalerweise reglos waren, zitterten nun wild. Ihre angeschwollenen Venen pulsierten unter den Kupferhalsbändern, in die ihre Vergehen eingraviert waren. Es war fast, als wären diese hirnlosen Halbmaschinen in einem ewigen Zustand der extremen Anspannung gefangen.

languages.text: Arşıkâhya olarak bu teftişin başlatılmasından ben müsebbiptim, Lord Kaptan'ı takip etmek de bana düşerdi. Birlikte hizmetörlere yaklaştığımızda normal şartlarda sabit olan göz bebeklerinin fıldır fıldır döndüğünü gördük. Şişkin damarları, eski suçlarının yazılmış olduğu bakır yakalarının altında bir inip bir çıkıyordu. Sanki bu bilinçsiz, makinemsi varlıklar; daimi bir aşırı gerginlik vaziyetine girmişlerdi.
languages.original_text: As High Factotum, it was I who had prompted that entire inspection, and thus it was my duty to follow the Lord Captain. As we stepped closer, we noticed a fascinating irregularity — the servitors' pupils, normally still, were shaking wildly. Their bulging veins were pulsating under their copper collars inscribed with their past offences. It was as if those mindless half-machines were locked in a perpetual state of extreme tension.

traits.locale_text: Arşıkâhya olarak bu teftişin başlatılmasından ben müsebbiptim, Lord Kaptan'ı takip etmek de bana düşerdi. Birlikte hizmetörlere yaklaştığımızda normal şartlarda sabit olan göz bebeklerinin çılgınca hareket ettiğini gördük. Şişkin damarları, eski suçlarının yazılmış olduğu bakır yakalarının altında bir inip bir çıkıyordu. Sanki bu bilinçsiz makinemsiler, daimi bir aşırı gerginlik vaziyetine girmişlerdi.
